title: navigateTo
description: navigateTo is a helper function that programmatically navigates users.

children.value: is available on both server side and client side.
is available on both server side and client side. It can be used within the
, or directly, to perform page navigation.

props.className: language-vue shiki shiki-themes material-theme-lighter material-theme-lighter material-theme-palenight
props.code:
<script setup lang="ts">
// passing 'to' as a string
await navigateTo('/search')

// ... or as a route object
await navigateTo({ path: '/search' })

// ... or as a route object with query parameters
await navigateTo({
  path: '/search',
  query: {
    page: 1,
    sort: 'asc'
  }
})
</script>

children.value: // ... or as a route object with query parameters

props.className: language-ts shiki shiki-themes material-theme-lighter material-theme-lighter material-theme-palenight

children.value: // setting the redirect code to '301 Moved Permanently'
influences how navigating to URLs is handled:
Internal URLs navigate with a full-page reload.

props.className: language-vue shiki shiki-themes material-theme-lighter material-theme-lighter material-theme-palenight
props.code:
<script setup lang="ts">
// will throw an error;
// navigating to an external URL is not allowed by default
await navigateTo('https://nuxt.com')

// will redirect successfully with the 'external' parameter set to 'true'
await navigateTo('https://nuxt.com', {
  external: true
})
</script>

children.value: // navigating to an external URL is not allowed by default
// will redirect successfully with the 'external' parameter set to 'true'

props.className: language-vue shiki shiki-themes material-theme-lighter material-theme-lighter material-theme-palenight
props.code:
<script setup lang="ts">
// will open 'https://nuxt.com' in a new tab
await navigateTo('https://nuxt.com', {
  open: {
    target: '_blank',
    windowFeatures: {
      width: 500,
      height: 500
    }
  }
})
</script>

children.value: // will open 'https://nuxt.com' in a new tab

props.className: language-ts shiki shiki-themes material-theme-lighter material-theme-lighter material-theme-palenight
props.code:
navigateTo(to: RouteLocationRaw | undefined | null, options?: NavigateToOptions) => Promise<void | NavigationFailure> | RouteLocationRaw

interface NavigateToOptions {
  replace?: boolean
  redirectCode?: number
  external?: boolean
  open?: OpenOptions
}
